description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Carrum, Kurrom, Indian Finger Billiards - call it what you will!  The Grandfather of Pool comes to XBox 360.  Play the classic game against up to 3 friends - including over Xbox LIVE!  Play with style to unlock bonus game items, and enjoy the new Time Attack mode and action replays!
